executiveSummary: Cynthia and John David, founders of Life Raft Treats, pitched their unique 'Fried Chicken Ice Cream' to the Sharks, seeking $250,000 for 5% equity. Despite positive reactions to their innovative desserts and compelling entrepreneurial story, all Sharks ultimately declined to invest, citing challenges in the frozen food market and limited scalability at the current stage.

actionItems.task: Revamp Life Raft's direct-to-consumer website and bring DTC operations in-house
Develop and track customer acquisition cost metrics

nextSteps: Life Raft Treats will continue to grow independently, focusing on strengthening their direct-to-consumer sales and optimizing marketing and distribution strategies without Shark investment.
